[00:00.00]Less Than Zero - The Weeknd
[00:02.92]Lyrics by：Max Martin/Oscar Holter/Abel Tesfaye
[00:05.85]Composed by：Max Martin/Oscar Holter/Abel Tesfaye
[00:08.78]Remember I was your hero yeah
[00:13.02]

[00:17.27]

[00:28.16]
[00:33.22]I know
[00:34.31]
[00:35.60]I'll always be less than zero
[00:37.52]
[00:39.87]Oh yeah
[00:40.34]

[00:54.86]
[00:56.53]Oh
[00:56.96]
[01:00.25]'Cause I can't get it out of my head
[01:04.64]
